Vi har : 


$$
T(s) = \frac{200}{s+1000}
$$

Omskrivning:

$$
T(s) = \frac{\frac{200}{s}}{\frac{1000}{s}+1}
$$


Giver:

$$
Z_1 = \frac{1000}{s}+1 - \frac{200}{s} \quad Z_2 = \frac{200}{s}
$$
$$
Z_1 = \frac{800}{s}+1 - \frac{200}{s} \quad Z_2 = \frac{200}{s}
$$

Derfor :
$$
Z_1 = \frac{1}{800}µF + 1 \Omega \quad Z_2 = \frac{1}{200µF}
$$


Skalering til $C_1 = 0.5µF$

$$
\frac{1}{800}µF \cdot \frac{1}{k} = 0.5µF \to k = 2500
$$

Derfor: 

$$
C_1 = 0.5µF \quad C_2 = 2µF  \quad R = 2500\Omega
$$
